title: FS: L. Doyle (AB), McQuillan (AB), Tinker, Marquard, Merkle (Sovereign 350)
author: Tripp Trapp

posts.post_title: FS: L. Doyle (AB), McQuillan (AB), Tinker, Marquard, Merkle (Sovereign 350)
posts.post_content:
Net54 Community,

For sale I have the following:

L. Doyle (With Bat) AB 350 No Frame PSA 4
McQuillan (With Bat) AB 350 No Frame PSA 4
Tinker (Bat on Shoulder) SC 350-460/42 OP PSA 4
Marquard (Portrait) reverse comma variation "N,Y." PSA 3
Merkle (Portrait) Sovereign 350 PSA 3.5

I'm asking pretty much what I have into them. The listed prices are net through PayPal and I will ship USPS First Class same day of receipt of payment.

Please PM me with any questions. I will email additional photos to those interested.

Thanks,
Eric
